mapper.select: SELECT * FROM comment WHERE parent_id = #{id} AND type = #{type} ORDER BY gmt_create
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(parent_id, content, commentator, gmt_create, gmt_modified, like_count, type, comment_count) VALUES(#{parentId}, #{content}, #{commentator}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified}, #{likeCount}, #{type}, #{commentCount});
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET comment_count = comment_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
